features.title: Everything you need to organize receipts
features.subtitle: Built for small businesses, freelancers, and accountants who value their time.

templateMapping.title: AI That Learns Your Format
templateMapping.description: Create custom export templates with YOUR column names (VAT Amount, Project Code, Client ID, etc.). Our AI automatically maps extracted data to your format‚Äîeven when receipts use different terms (Tax vs VAT vs Btw). Save 10 templates free, reuse unlimited times. Each export costs just 1 credit.

upload.title: Upload from Any Device
upload.description: Drag & drop receipts from your phone, email, or scanner. Supports all common image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP, TIFF, BMP, GIF) and PDFs up to 10MB per file.

aiExtraction.title: Multi-Document Intelligence
aiExtraction.description: Works across receipts, invoices, AND medical notes‚Äînot just receipts. AI adapts to different document types seamlessly. GPT-4 Vision achieves 98%+ accuracy on all formats. Handles multiple languages and currency formats automatically.

export.title: Export to Excel or CSV
export.description: Download organized spreadsheets ready for QuickBooks, Xero, or any accounting software.

aiTemplates.title: AI-Powered Template Export
aiTemplates.description: Smart templates adapt to your business needs. Our AI learns from your data and generates customized Excel templates with formulas, formatting, and structure tailored to your workflow.

pricing.title: Pay As You Go
pricing.description: Only $0.20-0.50 per document (not per-user subscription). Credits never expire‚Äîuse them when you need them. No hidden fees, no monthly commitment. Variable volume? Perfect. Process 10 documents one month, 100 the next.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: Your data is encrypted and never shared. GDPR compliant. Receipts automatically deleted after 90 days.

timeSaving.title: Save 5+ Hours Weekly
timeSaving.description: Stop manual data entry. Process 100 receipts in the time it takes to do 1 manually. Each receipt processes in under 5 seconds.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in 4 simple steps
howItWorks.description: From receipt photo to organized spreadsheet in under a minute

template.title: Design Your Perfect Export Format
template.description: Create a custom template with your exact column names and structure. Takes 2 minutes. Save up to 10 templates free‚Äîno credits charged.

upload.title: Upload Your Receipts
upload.description: Drag and drop receipts, invoices, or medical notes. Works with photos or PDFs from any device. Supports all major image formats.

process.title: AI Extracts & Maps to Your Template

export.title: Download in Your Format

howItWorks.cta: Start Free: Create Your First Template

items.quote: The template mapping feature is brilliant. I created one template for my VAT returns, and now every receipt automatically formats to match the tax office requirements. Saves me 20+ minutes every month, and I never make formatting errors anymore.
items.name: Lisa van Dijk

items.quote: As a small business owner, I don't have time for bookkeeping. This tool is a game-changer for expense tracking.
items.name: Marcus Johnson

items.quote: I was skeptical about AI accuracy, but ReceiptSort gets it right 98% of the time. The template mapping is the real game-changer though‚Äîmy receipts export exactly how my accountant needs them. No more manual reformatting.
items.name: Jennifer Martinez

accountant.description: Create 5 templates (one per client's format). AI maps all receipts automatically to the correct client template. Bill clients accurately without manual reorganization. Save 15+ hours per month.

medical.title: Medical Practice
medical.description: Create custom insurance claim templates. AI extracts from medical receipts and invoices, maps to YOUR insurance company's format. No more manual data entry for reimbursements.

euFreelancer.title: Freelancer (Tax/VAT Returns)
euFreelancer.description: Create tax declaration templates matching your country's government requirements. AI handles different receipt formats (Btw, VAT, MwSt, TVA, GST, Sales Tax) automatically. Export ready for submission.

variableVolume.title: Variable Volume Business
variableVolume.description: Process 10 documents one month, 100 the next. Pay only for what you use ($0.20-0.50 per document). Credits never expire. No wasteful monthly subscription.

support.title: Still have questions?
support.subtitle: Our support team is here to help. Get in touch and we'll respond within 24 hours.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ReceiptSort

accuracy.question: How accurate is the AI extraction?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves 98%+ accuracy on clear, standard receipts. You can always manually edit any extracted data before exporting.

formats.question: What file formats do you support?
formats.answer: We support all common image formats (JPG, PNG, JPEG, WebP, TIFF, BMP, GIF) and PDF files up to 10MB per file.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: We use a credit system. Each receipt costs 1 credit. Credits start at $0.50 each for small packages, or as low as $0.20 each when buying in bulk (e.g., 25 for $9.99, 500 for $99.99). Subscribe monthly for even better value.

expiration.question: Do credits expire?
expiration.answer: No, credits never expire. Use them whenever you need them.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes. We use bank-level encryption (256-bit SSL), and your receipts are automatically deleted after 90 days. We never share your data.

export.question: Can I export to QuickBooks or Xero?
export.answer: We export to Excel and CSV formats, which are compatible with QuickBooks, Xero, and all major accounting software. Simply import the downloaded file into your accounting system.

customTemplates.question: What are Custom Templates and why do I need them?
customTemplates.answer:
Custom Templates let you create reusable export formats tailored to YOUR needs‚Äîlike VAT declarations, specific accounting layouts, or insurance forms.

Why they matter: Other receipt tools export to THEIR fixed format. You then waste 2-3 minutes per document reorganizing columns, renaming headers, and reformatting to match your accounting system or government requirements.

With ReceiptSort: You create your ideal template ONCE with your exact column names (VAT Amount, Project Code, etc.). Our AI automatically maps all future receipts to your template columns‚Äîeven if receipts use different terms (Tax vs VAT vs Btw vs MwSt).

Pricing: Save up to 10 templates for FREE (no credits charged), then reuse them unlimited times. Each export costs just 1 credit, regardless of template complexity.

Example: Create a template with columns: Date | Vendor | Net Amount | VAT Amount | Total | Category. Every receipt you process will automatically export to this exact format‚Äîno manual reorganization needed.

wrongExtraction.question: What if the extraction is wrong?
wrongExtraction.answer: You can manually edit any extracted data before exporting. If extraction completely fails, we'll refund the credit.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on credit purchases if you're not satisfied.

business.question: Can I use this for my business?
business.answer: Absolutely! Many small businesses, freelancers, and accountants use ReceiptSort for expense tracking and bookkeeping.

software.question: Do I need to install any software?
software.answer: No, ReceiptSort is 100% web-based. Access it from any device with a web browser.

finalCTA.title: Ready to Stop Reorganizing Receipt Data?
finalCTA.subtitle: Start free: 10 credits + 10 custom templates. No credit card required.
finalCTA.trustIndicator: Join freelancers, accountants, and small businesses who process receipts in their own format‚Äîautomatically.

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: Each receipt you upload and process costs 1 credit. Credits are deducted only when the AI successfully extracts data from your receipt. You can purchase credits in packages or subscribe for monthly credits at a discounted rate.

doCreditsExpire.question: Do credits expire?
doCreditsExpire.answer: No, credits never expire. Once you purchase credits, they remain in your account until you use them. This gives you complete flexibility to use them at your own pace.

canIGetRefund.question: Can I get a refund?
canIGetRefund.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact us within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund on unused credits.

wrongExtraction.question: What if the extraction is wrong?
wrongExtraction.answer: If the AI extraction contains errors or doesn't meet your expectations, contact our support team. We'll review the case and provide a free retry or credit refund if the extraction quality was below our standards.

needSubscription.question: Do I need a subscription?
needSubscription.answer: No, subscriptions are completely optional. You can purchase credits as needed with our pay-as-you-go packages. Subscriptions are available if you want to save money with discounted monthly credits, but you're free to use the service however works best for you.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ReceiptSorter ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our receipt processing service.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
items: Account information (email address, name)
Receipt images and PDFs that you upload
Payment information (processed securely through Stripe)
Usage data and analytics

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide and maintain our receipt processing service
Process your receipts using AI technology
Process payments and manage your account
Send you service updates and promotional communications
Improve our services and develop new features
Comply with legal obligations

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
items: 256-bit SSL encryption for data transmission
Secure cloud storage with access controls
Automatic deletion of receipt files after 90 days
Regular security audits and updates

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with:
items: Service providers (OpenAI for receipt processing, Stripe for payments)
Law enforcement when required by law
Business partners with your explicit consent

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR and other privacy laws, you have the right to:
items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Export your data in a portable format
Opt-out of marketing communications
Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to provide our service and optional analytics cookies to improve user experience. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Receipt files are automatically deleted after 90 days. Account data is retained until you request deletion.

childrensPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our service is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using ReceiptSorter ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: ReceiptSorter is a cloud-based receipt processing service that uses artificial intelligence to extract data from receipt images and PDFs. The Service allows you to upload receipts, extract merchant information, amounts, dates, and other data, and export the results to Excel or CSV formats.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.intro: To use the Service, you must:
items: Create an account with accurate information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Be at least 18 years old
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
Be responsible for all activity under your account

credits.title: 4. Credits and Payment
credits.content: The Service operates on a credit-based system. Each receipt processed costs 1 credit. Credits can be purchased through our website using Stripe payment processing. Credits never expire. Prices are subject to change with notice. All sales are final unless otherwise stated in our refund policy.

usePolicy.title: 5. Acceptable Use
items: Upload illegal, fraudulent, or harmful content
Attempt to reverse engineer or hack the Service
Use the Service to violate any laws or regulations
Share your account credentials with others
Use automated scripts to abuse the Service

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service, including all content, features, and functionality, is owned by ReceiptSorter and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of your uploaded receipts and extracted data.

dataProcessing.title: 7. Data Processing
dataProcessing.content: We process your receipt data using OpenAI's GPT-4 Vision AI. Receipt files are stored securely and automatically deleted after 90 days. See our Privacy Policy for details on how we handle your data.

warranties.title: 8. Warranties and Disclaimers
warranties.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. We do not guarantee 100% accuracy in receipt data extraction. You are responsible for verifying extracted data before use.

limitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, RECEIPTSORT SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms. You may delete your account at any time through your account settings.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through the Service. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

governing.title: 12. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Netherlands. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of the Netherlands.

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.intro: Questions about these Terms? Contact us at:
